name: Amnesia
effect: Amnesia offers an energetic, euphoric high with enhanced focus and creativity. Perfect for daytime use when you need mental clarity without being too wired.

name: Gusher
effect: Gusher brings deep physical relaxation and a fruity punch of flavor. Ideal for stress relief, chill nights, or winding down after a long day.

name: Lemon Cherry
effect: Lemon Cherry delivers a blissful high with hints of cherry candy and citrus. It balances euphoria and calm, making it great for creativity and mood boosts.

name: Sacitrus
effect: SacitruS hits with a citrus burst and an uplifting, clear-headed high. Great for staying focused and productive while keeping your spirits light.

name: Tangie
effect: Tangie starts with a sharp tangerine aroma and ends in waves of happiness, motivation, and flow. Ideal for social or creative sessions.
